狔字的基本解释

狔
nǐ
〔猗（
y?）狔〕古同“旖旎”，柔和美丽，如“风光狔狔。”

狔字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nǐ］
［《廣韻》女氏切，上紙，娘。］
见“猗狔”。

狔字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狔； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页709第09
【廣韻】女氏切【集韻】乃倚切，?音抳。【廣韻】猗狔，從風貌。【集韻】弱貌。　又【集韻】女夷切，音尼。義同。

狔字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
狔字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
nǐ
〔Yi (
y?) 狔] Ancient Tong is "splendid", soft and beautiful, like "the scenery is awkward."
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nǐ］
["Guangyun" female clan cuts, puts on paper, mother. ]
See "猗狔".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狔; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 709 09
[Guang Yun] Female cut [Ji Yun] is to rely on cutting,? Sounds 抳. 【Guang Yun】Yin, from the style and appearance. [Jiyun] Weak appearance.　[Jiyun] Female Yi cuts, Yinni. The same meaning.
